item.title: gave gitlab pages a more discriptive name
item.description: https://about.gitlab.com/product/pages/ - — Hosting static site directly from GitLab repository

item.title: Added Form2Channel.com
item.description: https://form2channel.com - Place a static html form on your website and receive submissions directly to Google Sheets, Email, Slack, Telegram or Http. No coding necessary.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://ide.cs50.io/ - A free IDE powered by AWS Cloud9 by Harvard University.

item.title: Updating Freedb
item.description: https://freedb.tech - Free MySQL cloud database with remote access with PhpMyAdmin available. Free tier allows a database up to 100Mb in Database Storage. **If the database exceeding 100Mb will be deleted without any warning.**

item.title: Adding Freedb as a DBaaS list
item.description: https://freedb.tech - Free MySQL cloud database with remote access up to 100Mb in Database Storage with PhpMyAdmin available and unlimited simultaneous connections.

item.title: Adding Prepros.io to the IDE and Code Editing
item.description: https://prepros.io/ - Prepros can compile Sass, Less, Stylus, Pug/Jade, Haml, Slim, CoffeeScript and TypeScript out of the box, reloads your browsers and makes it really easy to develop & test your websites so you can focus on making them perfect. You can also add your own tools with just a few clicks.

item.title: Adding divio to the the PaaS
item.description: https://www.divio.com/ - A platform to manage cloud application deploying only using Docker. Available free subscription for development projects.
